baseline.description: Department-wide EVA rollout for knowledge workers.
baseline.notes: Numbers are illustrative only and not based on real Service Canada data.

scenarios.label: Conservative
scenarios.narrative: Even with half an hour saved per person per week, the EVA Suite rollout more than pays for itself within the first year.

scenarios.label: Expected
scenarios.narrative: At roughly one hour saved per week per knowledge worker, EVA becomes a major productivity lever with fast payback.

scenarios.label: Ambitious
scenarios.narrative: With deep adoption across 1,500 staff and strong workflow integration, EVA Suite looks more like a structural shift in capacity than a marginal tool.

disclaimer: This EVA Impact Analyzer hero uses static illustrative scenarios and is not a financial forecast.
